recipes.title: Ravioli Lasagna
steps: In a 9x13 baking dish, spread a thin layer of pasta sauce of the bottom
On top of the sauce, arrange a single layer of ravioli
Spread a layer of pasta sauce over the ravioli
Sprinkle a layer of mozzarella cheese over the sauce
Repeat layering 2 more times, ending with a layer of cheese on top
Bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes or until cheese is melted, bubbly, and just starting to brown
Remove from oven and let rest for 5 minutes before serving
recipes.author: Mark
